All submissions will be made via Moodle. 

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)


`Project Component` <- c("Initial Group Project Proposal", "Group Project Update/Method Draft",
                "Project Final Approval", "Final Poster and Presentation", "Final Technical Report", "Group Dynamic Report")

`Percent of Final Grade` <- c("5%", "5%", "2%", "10%", "12%", "1%")

`Due Date` <- c("February 22", "March 4", "March 25", "May 2", "May 8", "May 8")

kable(cbind(`Project Component`, `Percent of Final Grade`, `Due Date`))
```
